page.title: 12TRANSPORT
page.content: No public transport passes through the valley but a private bus service calls once a day en route from Essex to Sevenoaks.Local amenities such as the inn,the "Rising Sun",& the leisure cen- tres rely on customers using their own transport.However the new motorway,M20 traverses two of the squares on the map but has mainly been constructed through the unpopulated part of the area. The main road which runs through the valley goes through to Longfield with minor lanes leading off.Brands Hatch Racing circuit is just over the border but a runway for light aircraft has been made together with an overflow carpart for race meetings. The nearest railway station is at Longfield approx 2 miles away.
